Html:
Hi,

Is possible (or will be implemented in a future release) a way to specify a Page instance instead of the XAML Uri as Source parameter?

In this way it is possible to create a page passing parameters to the constructor and it is also possible to use IoC frameworks in a meaningful way.

Thanks

I‘m trying to find a solution of this problem。
have you worked it out？
if so，would you please help me ？thank you very much。
